turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good Morning! Can you do me a huge favor and order me a coffee and Starbucks for pickup on my way into the office?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Which location is the most convenient for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, Let's see the one off 14th Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I see 21 14th St NE, Atlanta is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, perfect. What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Venti Iced, Salted Caramel Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any Additions or changes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! Almond milk, no whipped cream no caramel sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I've got that. Anything else you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually I'd like a Bacon, Gouda and Egg sandwich.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have got that added to your pick up order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! Can you send me their address to plug into my google maps?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes! I will text that right over to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gosh, I am sorry can you add one more thing. Can you add a side of Espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! They have blonde or regular espresso roast.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Blonde roast sounds amazing!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how do you take it? Cafe' Americano? Cappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cappuccino is great thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! your order has sent to the Starbucks on 14th street here is the address like you asked. 14th street NE, Atlanta, GA 30309

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful!! Thank you, see you soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My Pleasure! The receipt will be available when you pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, Goodbye.
